author: Dave Lawler
title: The world leaders still denying the coronavirus threat
description: While some politicians have been criticized for a lack of leadership during the coronavirus crisis, Nicaraguan President Daniel Ortega takes that to an extreme. Driving the news: Nicaragua’s government continues to encourage crowds at stadiums and on beaches …
content:
While some politicians have been criticized for a lack of leadership during the coronavirus crisis, Nicaraguan President Daniel Ortega takes that to an extreme.
Driving the news: Nicaraguas government continues to encourage crowds at stadiums and on beaches … [+2016 chars]
